p: All experiments were carried out by three independent experiments, and the data were reported as the mean and standard error of means. The correlation of total flavonoid content and cytotoxic activity was plotted and the correlation coefficient ( r) calculated by using MicrosoftÂ® excel. The similarity of cytotoxic activity to the three cancer cells of the tested plants was classified using the hierarchical cluster analysis (HCA) and visualized as a heat map using Heatmap Illustrator (HemI) version 1.0 software [ 11].
